member.name: T:Apptelic.UberWebViewLib.ICookieStore
member.summary: Defines the contract for cross-platform cookie access.

member.name: M:Apptelic.UberWebViewLib.ICookieStore.GetCookies(System.Uri)
member.summary: Gets cookies for all domains (if URI is null) or for a specific domain / URI.
member.remarks: URI can't be null on Android.

member.name: M:Apptelic.UberWebViewLib.ICookieStore.SetCookies(System.Net.CookieCollection)
member.summary: Sets the cookies to be used for subsequent requests.

member.name: M:Apptelic.UberWebViewLib.ICookieStore.DeleteCookies(System.Uri)
member.summary: Deletes all cookies for given site/url.

member.name: T:Apptelic.UberWebViewLib.IUberWebViewRenderer
member.summary: Defines the contract for renderer.

member.name: M:Apptelic.UberWebViewLib.IUberWebViewRenderer.InvokeScript(System.String)
member.summary: Invokes the given script in the underlying WebView.

member.name: P:Apptelic.UberWebViewLib.IUberWebViewRenderer.Source
member.summary: Gets or sets the source URL of the underlying WebView.

member.name: P:Apptelic.UberWebViewLib.IUberWebViewRenderer.Referrer
member.summary: If set, sets the HTTP 'referer' header for the following request.

member.name: T:Apptelic.UberWebViewLib.UberWebView
member.summary: Implements an enhanced with error handling and optional auto-addition of query parameters

member.name: T:Apptelic.UberWebViewLib.UberWebView.NavigationException
member.summary: Provides an exception wrapper for platform-specific navigation errors.
member.remarks: The platform-specific exception may be provided in the property.

member.name: M:Apptelic.UberWebViewLib.UberWebView.NavigationException.#ctor(System.String,System.Int32,System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Apptelic.UberWebViewLib.UberWebView.NavigationException.Url
member.summary: Gets the failing URL.

member.name: P:Apptelic.UberWebViewLib.UberWebView.NavigationException.ErrorCode
member.summary: Gets the error code.

member.name: M:Apptelic.UberWebViewLib.UberWebView.InvokeScript(System.String)
member.summary: Invokes the given script in the underlying native WebView.

member.name: M:Apptelic.UberWebViewLib.UberWebView.OnNavigationStarting(System.String)
member.summary: Called when a new navigation has started.
member.returns: True to allow navigation, false to cancel.

member.name: E:Apptelic.UberWebViewLib.UberWebView.NavigationStarting
member.summary: Occurs when navigation is about to start, giving subscribers the option to cancel.

member.name: E:Apptelic.UberWebViewLib.UberWebView.NavigationStarted
member.summary: Occurs when navigation has actually started.

member.name: E:Apptelic.UberWebViewLib.UberWebView.NavigationFinished
member.summary: Occurs when navigation has finished successfully.

member.name: E:Apptelic.UberWebViewLib.UberWebView.NavigationFailed
member.summary: Occurs when navigation has failed.
member.remarks: The property contains the navigation failure reason or description and the property contains the platform-specific error code or HTTP status value.

member.name: E:Apptelic.UberWebViewLib.UberWebView.ScriptMessageReceived
member.summary: Occurs when a script message is received.

member.name: P:Apptelic.UberWebViewLib.UberWebView.SourceUrl
member.summary: Gets as a string.

member.name: P:Apptelic.UberWebViewLib.UberWebView.SourceUri
member.summary: Gets as a URI.

member.name: P:Apptelic.UberWebViewLib.UberWebView.CanGoBack
member.summary: Indicates whether the user can navigate to previous pages.
member.remarks: Note: this is set by the renderer after each navigation completes.

member.name: P:Apptelic.UberWebViewLib.UberWebView.CanGoForward
member.summary: Indicates whether the user can navigate forward.
member.remarks: Note: this is set by the renderer after each navigation completes.

member.name: P:Apptelic.UberWebViewLib.UberWebView.QueryParam
member.summary: Gets or sets the query parameter(s) to add to all requests.

member.name: P:Apptelic.UberWebViewLib.UberWebView.QueryParamDomain
member.summary: Gets or sets the domain for which the query parameter will be added, or leave empty to add parameter to queries for all domains.

member.name: P:Apptelic.UberWebViewLib.UberWebView.PageLoadedScript
member.summary: Gets or sets the script to inject on each page load.

member.name: P:Apptelic.UberWebViewLib.UberWebView.Actions
member.summary: Collection of action methods to invoke on certain actions, where key is the action and value is the method to invoke on that action occurring.

member.name: P:Apptelic.UberWebViewLib.UberWebView.CustomUserAgent
member.summary: Gets or sets the custom user agent string, to which " ([platform] UberWebView)" is appended, e.g. "my.app.name (Android UberWebView)" or "My Super App (iOS UberWebView)".

member.name: P:Apptelic.UberWebViewLib.UberWebView.Renderer
member.summary: Set by the renderer to allow direct calling via .

member.name: P:Apptelic.UberWebViewLib.UberWebView.Cookies
member.summary: Gets the cookies.

member.name: P:Apptelic.UberWebViewLib.UberWebView.Referrer
member.summary: If set, sets the HTTP 'referer' header for the following request.
